name: Very Original Puzzle Game
description:
In a delirious stroke of desperation I cooked this up in the final 8-9 hours of the LD42 Jam. Move your crystal thing with Arrows or WASD and avoid walls, which you create by moving. Collect keys, unlock locks and go through portals. Clever, amirite?

Controls:

- WASD / Arrows: Move

- Enter: Start game
